title: BRIEF-Guinea Insurance FY Pretax Loss 50 Mln Naira Vs Profit Of 237.8 Mln Naira
text:
BRIEF-Guinea Insurance FY Pretax Loss 50 Mln Naira Vs Profit Of 237.8 Mln Naira

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 11:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Guinea Insurance FY Pretax Loss 50 Mln Naira Vs Profit Of 237.8 Mln Naira Sept 23 (Reuters) - Guinea Insurance PLC : * FY LOSS BEFORE TAX 50 MILLION NAIRA VERSUS PROFIT OF 237.8 MILLION NAIRA * FY GROSS PREMIUM WRITTEN 1.24 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS 967.1 MILLION NAIRA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: GUINEAI.LG
